findings.title: S3 server-side encryption is disabled
findings.description: Terraform module is missing encryption settings for S3 buckets.

findings.title: Cost center tags missing
findings.description: Resources are missing `owner` and `cost_center` tags required for chargeback.

findings.title: IAM policy grants wildcard permissions
findings.description: Sentinel detected IAM policy configured with `*` permissions.
findings.remediation: Split administrative duties into scoped roles and enforce MFA.

findings.title: Namespace prod missing network policy
findings.description: Kyverno detected missing default deny network policy for the namespace.
findings.remediation: Apply a Kyverno policy to enforce baseline network policies.

findings.title: Namespace prod using non-Always image pull policy
findings.description: Non-Always policies risk stale container images bypassing security patches.
findings.remediation: Set `imagePullPolicy: Always` on deployments handling regulated workloads.

findings.title: Runtime scan detected critical vulnerabilities
findings.description: Container runtime scan surfaced critical CVEs requiring patching.
findings.remediation: Initiate rolling patch workflow via Summit auto-patcher.

findings.title: Customer data isolation
findings.description: Ensure MC data is isolated from Summit tenants via network segmentation and IAM scoping.
findings.remediation: Deploy Calico baseline deny-all with service mesh segmentation.

findings.title: Economic auto-scaling guardrails
findings.description: Maintain auto-scaling budgets below 5% monthly variance with automated anomaly remediation.
findings.remediation: Enable automated GuardDuty to Security Hub workflow with budget-aware remediation lambdas.

auto_patches.description: Apply Terraform patch to enforce SSE-KMS on MC and Summit buckets.

Bootstrap zero-trust network policy set with Kyverno mutation policies.
